verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I'll never be more loved than I am right now
Wasn't holding You up
So there's nothing I can do to let You down
It doesn't take a trophy to make You proud
I'll never be more loved than I am right now, oh

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Going through a storm but I won't go down
I hear Your voice
Carried in the rhythm of the wind to call me out
You would cross an ocean so I wouldn't drown
You've never been closer than You are right now

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Jirah, you are enough
Jirah, you are enough
And I will be content
in every circumstance
Jirah, you are enough.

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: Forever enough, always enough, more than enough

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
I don't wanna forget how I feel right now
On the mountaintop
I can see so clear what it's all about
So stay by my side when the sun goes down
Don't wanna forget how I feel right now

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
I'm already loved, I'm already chosen
I know who I am, I know what you've spoken
I'm already loved, more thank I can imagine
And that is enough, that is enough.

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
If he dresses the Lilies,
With beauty and splendour
how much more will he clothe you x2
If he watches over, every sparrow,
How much more will he love you x2

verse.name: v1i
verse.lines:
More than you ask, think or imagine
According to His power
Working in us
it's more than enough
